Class UnrestrictedGuessingGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • GuessingGame
      • UnrestrictedGuessingGame

  • public class UnrestrictedGuessingGame
extends GuessingGame
    Program in the form of the 20 Questions guessing game. Inherits from GuessingGame.java Person thinks of an answer either from list of items or from themselves, and computer will try to guess it.
